overview: Mr. Shawn B. Welch has advised on, underwritten or invested over $75 billion dollars of capital during his 22 year career. These transactions were executed across a broad range of asset classes and industry sectors including consumer products, retail, basic industries, specialty finance, technology, franchising and healthcare. He founded his own advisory and principal investing firm, Midtown Capital Advisors, in 2006 after serving as a Partner with Roark Capital Group since 2002. From 1989 to 2002 he served in multiple Investment Banking roles with Banc of America Securities and its predecessor organizations; lastly managing the Southeastern Investment Banking Group. Mr. Welch has advised or served on the Board of Directors of 25 companies during his career. He is a graduate of the Georgia Institute of Technology, with highest honors, and resides in Atlanta, Georgia where he has spent his entire career.
